alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:26PM EDT until April 08 at 10:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rondout Creek At Rosendale. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 19.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 12/21/1973. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Rondout Creek Rosendale Flood Stage: 18.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 pm: 15.6 Forecast: Fri 2 am 17.8 Fri 8 am 19.6 Fri 2 pm 18.6 Fri 8 pm 17.3 Sat 2 am 16.3 Sat 8 am 15.4 Sat 2 pm 14.6 Sat 8 pm 13.7 Sun 2 am 13.0 Sun 8 am 12.5 Sun 2 pm 12.0 &&
